TopicTitle: Bill Kerman Has Touched Down on the Mun!

Articles.Content:
After many long years of wanting to try KSP I have finally put boots on the Mun! 

Bill Kerman has officially touched down on the surface of the Mun and I only lost like 3 Kerbals today in the process, I'll call that a new personal best!

 

 

 

Unfortunately Bill was too focused on the beautiful lunar moonrise and knocked over the already busted lander

Don't know how he's gonna get back home so I hope he has snacks in that lander pod
Welcome to the fourms! I kinda had the same situation but I added a reaction wheel. I think you can send a probe with a 1 man cockpit and rescue bill.
